tool_description:
Uma API para consultar as noticias relacionadas a Lei Geral de Proteção de dados no Brasil. 

An API to check news related to the General Data Protection Law in Brazil.
name: LGPD News
title: LGPD News

api_list.name: Get All LGPD News by Portal
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about LGPD, from all big news portals in Brazil.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lgpd-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/anpd"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lgpd-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lgpd-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lgpd-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search by keyword
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all content related to a keyword inform in the requisition
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lgpd-news.p.rapidapi.com/search?key=dados"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lgpd-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
